title: PathFinder 5.0.5 + Crack (re-uploaded)
description:
IMPORTANT:

Alright, so it looks like for some reason TPB is removing execute privileges from files on upload. Because of this, the "Path Finder [P]atch.app" will not open. There are two ways of solving this problem.

a) A second zipped version of the patcher is included. Unzip that, and use "Path Finder [P]atch2.app" to patch Path Finder. This is the recommended method.

b) Navigate to "/Path Finder [P]atch.app/Contents/MacOS" and apply execute privileges to the "iPatcher" binary. Anybody experienced in computers should know how to do this. For those who don't, all it takes is a "chmod a+x [path to iPatcher file]" in Terminal.

I apologize for the inconvenience.

__________________________________________________________________________________________


A great alternative to Finder.app, it has a similar look and many more features. Includes version 5.0.5 of the app, as well as a crack courtesy of [K]ambing. This is compatible with Mac OS 10.5 Leopard ONLY. Comments and feedback are appreciated.

The other "PathFinder 5.0.5 + Crack" torrent seems to have been corrupted somehow. Please download this one instead.

Please seed at least 2x! The files are small, so it won't take very much bandwidth.
